701.question: Do they study frequent user responses to help automate modelling of those?

3-Figure2-1.png: Yes, they study frequent user responses to help automate the modelling of those.</s>
Yes, they study frequent user responses to help automate the modelling of those.</s>

703.question: Do they use the same distance metric for both the SimCluster and K-means algorithm?

6-Table1-1.png: Yes, they use the same distance metric for both the SimCluster and K-means algorithm, which is the Euclidean distance.</s>
Yes, they use the same distance metric for both the SimCluster and K-means algorithm, which is the Euclidean distance.</s>
